title: Watchguard Firebox
descriptionMarkdown: Watchguard Firebox （https://www.watchguard.com/wgrd-products/firewall-appliances and https://www.watchguard.com/wgrd-products/cloud-and-virtual-firewalls） is security products/firewall-appliances. Watchguard Firebox will send syslog to Watchguard Firebox collector agent.The agent then sends the message to the workspace.
additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on Kusto Function to work as expected. Follow the steps to use this Kusto Function alias **WatchguardFirebox** in queries and workbooks. [Follow steps to get this Kusto Function>](https://aka.ms/sentinel-watchguardfirebox-parser)

sampleQueries.description: Firebox log category count in last 24 hours
sampleQueries.query:
WatchguardFirebox
 | where HostName contains 'WatchGuard'
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| summarize count() by SeverityLevel

sampleQueries.description: Firebox top 10 messages in last 24 hours
sampleQueries.query:
WatchguardFirebox
 | where HostName contains 'WatchGuard'
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| summarize count() by SyslogMessage
| top 10 by count_ desc

sampleQueries.description: Firebox top 10 HostIP in last 24 hours
sampleQueries.query:
WatchguardFirebox
 | where HostName contains 'WatchGuard'
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| summarize count() by HostIP
| top 10 by count_ desc

dataTypes.name: Syslog (Firebox)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
WatchguardFirebox
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
WatchguardFirebox
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

instructionSteps.description: >This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected. [Follow these steps](https://aka.ms/sentinelgithubparsersWatchguardFirebox) to create the Kusto Functions alias, **WatchguardFirebox**

instructionSteps.title: 1. Install and onboard the agent for Linux
instructionSteps.description:
Typically, you should install the agent on a different computer from the one on which the logs are generated.

>  Syslog logs are collected only from **Linux** agents.

parameters.title: Choose where to install the agent:

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on Azure Linux Virtual Machine
instructionSteps.description: Select the machine to install the agent on and then click **Connect**.

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on a non-Azure Linux Machine
instructionSteps.description: Download the agent on the relevant machine and follow the instructions.

instructionSteps.title: 2. Configure the logs to be collected
instructionSteps.description:
Configure the facilities you want to collect and their severities.

1.  Under workspace advanced settings **Configuration**, select **Data** and then **Syslog**.
2.  Select **Apply below configuration to my machines** and select the facilities and severities.
3.  Click **Save**.
